featureSchema.name: Search and Filter
featureSchema.description: Implements keyword search and filter functionalities, allowing users to quickly find tasks based on attributes like title, description, due date, priority, and tags.
featureSchema.userStory: As a user, I want to quickly search for tasks using keywords and filter tasks by specific criteria so that I can efficiently manage my workload.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Ability to search tasks by keywords in the title and description. 2. Filter tasks based on due date, priority, and tags. 3. Support sorting by creation date or due date.
featureSchema.diagram: Diagram showing the search and filtering process flow.
featureSchema.additional: Consider using full-text search capabilities and optimized query performance.
featureSchema.prompt: Create a search and filter feature for the Todo app database to enable users to search tasks by keywords and apply filters such as due date, priority, and tags. Include sorting functionality.
featureSchema.notes: Optimizations might include indexing on searchable columns to improve performance.
